snippet: Social media is doing to raucous spring break gatherings what parents and colleges were not able to do: keep them in check, for fear of unsavory evidence popping up online.
abstract: Current generation of college students are toning down the wild antics usually associated with spring break vacations, largely out of fear that their behavior will be captured via cell phone and posted to the Web.
lead_paragraph: Social media is doing to raucous spring break gatherings what parents and colleges were not able to do: keep them in check, for fear of unsavory evidence popping up online.

headline.seo: Spring Break Gets Tamer as World Watches Online
headline.main: Spring Break Gets Tamer as World Watches Online
headline.print_headline: Spring Break Gets Tamer With World Watching Online
